 A door shattered in the lab. Guiledart looked up and
saw Klank. "Oh i forgot to activate you...ah well."
Klank starred down the beam going across his obtics in
a sycrinized pattern. "Lank kill enemies. Klank blow
up." Guiledart got up. "Yes Klank kill things blah
blah lets go." The three destrons went into the
bridge. Klank was a tank vehicle with 3 side opening
missles and 4 openings where pulse rifles came out and
3 openings with machine guns. He was heavily built
wreckaing machine of firepower.
